    • addMedicalCard

      public void addMedicalCard(MedicalCard medicalCard)
      Adds medical card and creates connection if medical card is null. If not - removes existing connection and create a new one. (recursive call after setting this.medicalCard = null)
      Parameters:
      medicalCard - MedicalCard removeMedicalCard(MedicalCard)

      Parameters:
      medicalService - MedicalService
      Throws:
      ObjectAlreadyInUseException - when medical service is already assigned to appointment.

    • addReceptionist

      public void addReceptionist(Employee receptionist) throws EmployeeRoleException, DoubleAssignmentException
      Adds receptionist and creates connection if receptionist is null. If not - removes existing connection and create a new one. Receptionist cannot be assigned if same object is assigned as vet. (recursive call after setting this.receptionist = null)
      Parameters:
      receptionist - Employee
      Throws:
      EmployeeRoleException - when employee does not have EmployeeRole.VET
      DoubleAssignmentException - when employee is already assigned as vet
      See Also:
      • Employee.canReceptionistBeAssignedToAppointment(Appointment)

    • removeReceptionist

      public void removeReceptionist(Employee receptionist)
      Removes receptionist and connection between.
      Parameters:
      receptionist - Employee

    • addVet

      public void addVet(Employee vet) throws EmployeeRoleException, DoubleAssignmentException
      Adds vet and creates connection if vet is null. If not - removes existing connection and create a new one. Vet cannot be assigned if same object is assigned as receptionist. (recursive call after setting this.receptionist = null)
      Parameters:
      vet - Employee
      Throws:
      EmployeeRoleException - when employee does not have EmployeeRole.RECEPTIONIST
      DoubleAssignmentException - when employee is already assigned as receptionist
      See Also:
      • Employee.canVetBeAssignedToAppointment(Appointment)

    • removeVet

      public void removeVet(Employee vet)
      Removes vet and connection between
      Parameters:
      vet - Employee
